verses.verse: וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> sent חִירָ֨ם <S%H2438><s%> And Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king צ֤וֹר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> his servants אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> unto Solomon כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when שָׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> for he had heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> מָשְׁח֥וּ <S%H4886><s%> that they had anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him king תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> place אָבִ֑יהוּ <S%H1><s%> in the room of his father כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אֹהֵ֗ב <S%H157><s%> a lover הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had חִירָ֛ם <S%H2438><s%> for Hiram לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> was ever ס
וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִירָ֖ם <S%H2438><s%> to Hiram לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> You יָדַ֜עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Thou knowest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> how that David אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכֹל֙ <S%H3201><s%> could לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> not build בַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> unto the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> his God מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> the wars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבָבֻ֑הוּ <S%H5437><s%> which were about him on every side עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> until תֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> put יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> until the LORD אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כַּפּ֥וֹת <S%H3709><s%> them under the soles [רַגְלֹו כ] (רַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure ק)

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now הֵנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> hath given me rest יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> But now the LORD אֱלֹהַ֛י <S%H430><s%> my God לִ֖י מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> on every side אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there שָׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> [so that there is] neither adversary וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> is neither פֶּ֥גַע <S%H6294><s%> occurrent רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> nor evil

וְהִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> And behold I purpose לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> unto the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> my God כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> whom דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> my father לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying בִּנְךָ֗ <S%H1121><s%> Thy son אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom אֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> whom I will set תַּחְתֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H8478><s%> your place עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְאֶ֔ךָ <S%H3678><s%> upon thy throne הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> in thy room he shall build הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> unto my name

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now צַוֵּה֩ <S%H6680><s%> Now therefore command וְיִכְרְתוּ־ <S%H3772><s%> thou that they hew לִ֨י אֲרָזִ֜ים <S%H730><s%> me cedar trees מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַלְּבָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> out of Lebanon וַֽעֲבָדַי֙ <S%H5650><s%> and my servants יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> will be with עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> shall be with thy servants וּשְׂכַ֤ר <S%H7939><s%> hire עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> for thy servants אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and unto thee will I give לְךָ֔ כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תֹּאמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> according to all that thou shalt appoint כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> for thou knowest כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there בָּ֛נוּ אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that [there is] not among us any יֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> that can skill לִכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> to hew עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> timber כַּצִּדֹנִֽים׃ <S%H6722><s%> like unto the Sidonians

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֧עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard חִירָ֛ם <S%H2438><s%> And it came to pass when Hiram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon וַיִּשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> that he rejoiced מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> which hath given לְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> unto David בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son חָכָ֔ם <S%H2450><s%> a wise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people הָרָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> over this great הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent חִירָם֙ <S%H2438><s%> And Hiram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁמַ֕עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> I have considered אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁלַ֖חְתָּ <S%H7971><s%> the things which thou sentest אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> to me for [and] I will do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner חֶפְצְךָ֔ <S%H2656><s%> all thy desire בַּעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> concerning timber אֲרָזִ֖ים <S%H730><s%> of cedar וּבַעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> and concerning timber בְרוֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H1265><s%> of fir

עֲ֠בָדַי <S%H5650><s%> My servants יֹרִ֨דוּ <S%H3381><s%> shall bring [them] down מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַלְּבָנ֜וֹן <S%H3844><s%> from Lebanon יָ֗מָּה <S%H3220><s%> unto the sea וַ֠אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> and I אֲשִׂימֵ֨ם <S%H7760><s%> and I will convey דֹּבְר֤וֹת <S%H1702><s%> in floats בַּיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> them by sea עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where תִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that thou shalt appoint אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about וְנִפַּצְתִּ֥ים <S%H5310><s%> me and will cause them to be discharged שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you תִשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> there and thou shalt receive וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> [them] and thou shalt accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶפְצִ֔י <S%H2656><s%> my desire לָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> in giving לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> food בֵּיתִֽי׃ <S%H1004><s%> for my household

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become חִיר֜וֹם <S%H2438><s%> So Hiram נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לִשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon עֲצֵ֧י <S%H6086><s%> trees אֲרָזִ֛ים <S%H730><s%> cedar וַעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> trees בְרוֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H1265><s%> and fir כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> much חֶפְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H2656><s%> [according to] all his desire

וּשְׁלֹמֹה֩ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לְחִירָ֜ם <S%H2438><s%> Hiram עֶשְׂרִים֩ <S%H6242><s%> twenty אֶ֨לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand כֹּ֤ר <S%H3734><s%> measures חִטִּים֙ <S%H2406><s%> of wheat מַכֹּ֣לֶת <S%H4361><s%> [for] food לְבֵית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his household וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty כֹּ֖ר <S%H3734><s%> measures שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil כָּתִ֑ית <S%H3795><s%> of pure כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus יִתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> thus gave שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לְחִירָ֖ם <S%H2438><s%> to Hiram שָׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year בְשָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> by year פ

וַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> gave חָכְמָה֙ <S%H2451><s%> wisdom לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> as he promised ל֑וֹ וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> and there was שָׁלֹ֗ם <S%H7965><s%> him and there was peace בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> between חִירָם֙ <S%H2438><s%> between Hiram וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon וַיִּכְרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> made בְרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a league שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> together

וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> raised הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon מַ֖ס <S%H4522><s%> a levy מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> out of all Israel וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמַּ֔ס <S%H4522><s%> and the levy שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> was thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <S%H7971><s%> And he sent לְבָנ֗וֹנָה <S%H3844><s%> them to Lebanon עֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <S%H505><s%> thousand בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> a month חֲלִיפ֔וֹת <S%H2487><s%> by courses חֹ֚דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> a month יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> were in בַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> they were in Lebanon שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> [and] two חֳדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2320><s%> months בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> at home וַאֲדֹנִירָ֖ם <S%H141><s%> and Adoniram עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמַּֽס׃ <S%H4522><s%> [was] over the levy ס

וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> become לִשְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> had threescore and ten אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> that bare סַבָּ֑ל <S%H5449><s%> burdens וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand חֹצֵ֥ב <S%H2672><s%> hewers בָּהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains

לְ֠בַד <S%H905><s%> alone מִשָּׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> Beside the chief הַנִּצָּבִ֤ים <S%H5324><s%> officers לִשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> which [were] over the work שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הָרֹדִ֣ים <S%H7287><s%> which ruled בָּעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> over the people הָעֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> that wrought בַּמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> in the work

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וַיַּסִּעוּ֩ <S%H5265><s%> and they brought אֲבָנִ֨ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֜וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great אֲבָנִ֧ים <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָר֛וֹת <S%H3368><s%> costly לְיַסֵּ֥ד <S%H3245><s%> to lay the foundation הַבָּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַבְנֵ֥י <S%H68><s%> stones גָזִֽית׃ <S%H1496><s%> [and] hewed

וַֽיִּפְסְל֞וּ <S%H6458><s%> did hew בֹּנֵ֧י <S%H1129><s%> builders שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon's וּבֹנֵ֥י <S%H1129><s%> builders חִיר֖וֹם <S%H2438><s%> and Hiram's וְהַגִּבְלִ֑ים <S%H1382><s%> [them] and the stonesquarers וַיָּכִ֛ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> so they prepared הָעֵצִ֥ים <S%H6086><s%> timber וְהָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> and stones לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house פ
